title: New Year's Fiesta
description: Kick off the new year with a vibrant celebration featuring live music and traditional Mexican cuisine.
summary: A festive New Year's event with music, food, and dancing.
importance: Celebrates the start of a new year with community and culture.

title: Valentine's Day Latin Dance
description: Celebrate love with a romantic night of Latin dance and special desserts.
summary: A romantic event with Latin dance lessons and desserts.
importance: Promotes love and cultural appreciation through dance.

title: Women's History Month Celebration
description: Join us to honor the achievements of women in the Latinx community.
summary: A celebration of women’s contributions with guest speakers and performances.
importance: Highlights the impact of women in the Latinx community.

title: Café de Olla Tasting
description: Taste our signature café de olla in different forms and flavors.
summary: A tasting event featuring our signature café de olla in various creative forms.
importance: Promotes the unique flavors and traditions of café de olla.

title: Cinco de Mayo Fiesta
description: Celebrate Cinco de Mayo with live mariachi music, traditional food, and dance.
summary: A festive Cinco de Mayo event with music, food, and cultural activities.

title: Music & Poetry Night
description: Enjoy a night of live music and poetry from local artists.
summary: A gathering of musicians and poets sharing their art and passion.
importance: Provides a platform for local artists and poets to express themselves.

title: Latin Jazz Festival
description: Enjoy the rhythms and melodies of Latin jazz performed by top musicians.
summary: A festival showcasing the best of Latin jazz with live performances.
importance: Brings together jazz enthusiasts and celebrates Latin musical heritage.

title: Guest Chef Night: Authentic Mexican Cuisine
description: Experience a night of authentic Mexican cuisine crafted by guest chef Diego Rivera.
summary: Guest chef Diego Rivera brings his expertise in authentic Mexican cuisine.
importance: Provides a unique opportunity to experience authentic Mexican cuisine.

title: Latino Film Festival
description: Watch critically acclaimed Latin American films and engage with filmmakers.
summary: A film festival showcasing the best of Latin American cinema.
importance: Highlights the diverse voices and storytelling traditions of Latin American filmmakers.

title: Guest Speaker Series: Latino Entrepreneurs
description: Learn from successful Latino entrepreneurs as they share their journeys and insights.
summary: A panel discussion featuring successful Latino entrepreneurs.
importance: Inspires and empowers aspiring entrepreneurs in the Latino community.

title: Day of the Dead Celebration
description: Honor and remember loved ones with a traditional Día de los Muertos celebration.
summary: A traditional celebration of Día de los Muertos with altars, music, and food.
importance: Preserves and shares the cultural traditions of Día de los Muertos.

title: Holiday Tamalada
description: Join us for a festive tamalada where we make and share tamales.
summary: A traditional tamale-making event to celebrate the holiday season.
importance: Promotes community bonding and cultural traditions during the holidays.
